=Autoexp.dat=

Put the following applicable in adequate sections.

==`AutoExpand`==

{{{
; Tamy
Vector=x=<x> y=<y> z=<z> w=<w>
Quaternion=x=<x> y=<y> z=<z> w=<w>
Plane=a=<a> b=<b> c=<c> d=<d>
}}}
